greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the n-th term of the leading column of right triangle in A274650 minus n.
comment: It appears that this sequence has infinitely many negative integers, infinitely many zeros and infinitely many positive integers.
mathematica: (* function a286294[] is defined in A286294 using A274651 *)
a288384[104] (* data *) (* _Hartmut F. W. Hoft_, Jun 13 2017 *)
